about_the_game:
Marble Havoc is a 3D-action game. Take your marble in different levels to the goal.

You start with your marble on a way in a waterland. Navigate your marble over the way without falling into the water.



Jump over obstacles and ditches. Find the flag. Your mission is to navigate your marble to the flag and hit the flag pole. Then you mastered the level.

You are not alone! In the waterland there are other marbles on their way:



  • Unfriendly red marbles want to kick you off the way into the water. Avoid any contact with them.
  • The green marbles try to push the red marbles away.
